			Rls notes.
			
			Back again with another kickass record with Spiritus sancti. This one is a rare one, only released as a demo/promo to ship out to
			recordlables and gigplaces.
			The songs was recorded in spring 2007 by the famous Tommy TÃƒÂ¤gtgren in the even more famous "Studio Abyss".
			Nothing more to say, listen and make up your own thoughts what you think about it.
			
			Spiritus Sancti was formed in 2001 in a small Swedish town called Motala. 
			Since then melodic metal has been delivered on two full length records and one demo:
			- "Human Unknown" (Fullhouse records, 2002)
			- "Silence of the Angel Choir" (demo, 2003)
			- "Lead Salvation" (selfreleased, 2006)
			- "Self titled" (demo/promo 2007)
			The musical direction was at first strongly influed by the Gothenburg metal scene. Today, a few line-up changes later, the band has evolved and is now influed by most kinds of metal. 
			In late 2005 a music video for the song "Downward" was recorded and released on DVD by the band members themselves. 
			Beside the recordings a large amount of gigs has been performed over the years with bands like In Flames and Entombed

			Rippers notes.
			This release is approved by the band themselves, see it as a gift, and feel free to spread it as much as you want to.

			
			+SST+2008+
